title: Larceny! Straight steal of home gives Texas Tech walk-off vs. rival - MLB.com
content: Larceny! Straight steal of home gives Texas Tech walk-off vs. rival  MLB.com
description:
Kurt Wilson stared keenly at the eyes of Texas Longhorns reliever Aaron Nixon as Nixon came to his set position on Friday night at Dan Law Field in Lubbock, Texas. It was the bottom of the 10thÂ inning, and Wilson's Texas Tech Red Raiders were tied with Texas, 4-4.
